submitFeedback

public void submitFeedback(VesselListener actionListener,
                           String email,
                           String message,
                           VesselEnums.FeedbackType feedbackCategory,
                           boolean includeSystemDetails)
This is a feedback api method, This method submit user feedback to platform.

Parameters:
actionListener - : Action listener gives call back on sucess or on error.
email - : User email.
message - : Feedback message
feedbackCategory - : Pass a feedback category.
includeSystemDetails - : Pass true if want to include system details along with user feedback

                           String message,
                           VesselEnums.FeedbackType feedbackCategory,
                           boolean includeSystemDetails)
This is a feedback api method, This method submit user feedback to platform.

Parameters:
email - : User email.
message - : Feedback message
feedbackCategory - : Pass a feedback category.
includeSystemDetails - : Pass true if want to include system details along with user feedback

addMetaData

public void addMetaData(String metaData)
Method to add additional meta data which will reported along with Crashes or Feedback. Max allowed length is 440

Parameters:
metaData -

setCrashReportingMode

public void setCrashReportingMode(VesselEnums.CrashReportingMode mode)
Method to set crash reporting mode. By default crash report mode is not silent.In silent crash reporting mode sdk does not show force closed dialog to user.

Parameters:
mode -
